original_text: I myself do not want people to praise me. But there is someone who wants people to praise me. He is the one who decides if I am right.
korean_text: 나는 내 영광을 구하지 아니하나 구하고 판단하시는 이가 계시니라

sentences.original_text: I myself do not want people to praise me.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 사람들이 나를 칭찬하기를 원하지 않는다.

sentences.original_text: who wants people to praise me.
who decides if I am right.
